forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun. High 62F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning, then clouds lingering in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning, then clouds lingering in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 62F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Low clouds and fog. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low around 5C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 42F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 3C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 38F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 10C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 51F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
